text: My sweet mujer. I hope your afternoon is amazing and and filled with love and happiness. I want you to know that my heart is yours and my body and soul is all yours mami. You are the owner of my love. Mami thank you spending lunch with me. I love having you by my side mami. Never forget te amo te amo te amo con todo mi alma mamacita de mi vidaâ£ï¸â£ï¸â£ï¸â£ï¸â£ï¸â£ï¸ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
